mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (bname, cus_no, gender, season, style, tags, content, snapshot_image, additional_images, like_count, write_date, is_del) VALUES (#{bname}, #{cus_no}, #{gender}, #{season}, #{style}, #{tags}, #{content}, #{snapshot_image}, #{additional_images}, 0, NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE bname = 'snap'

SELECT id, cus_no, gender, season, style, title, content, snapshot_image, like_count, write_date, is_del FROM board WHERE 1=1 AND bname = 'snap' AND gender = #{gender} AND season LIKE CONCAT('%', #{season}, '%') AND style LIKE CONCAT('%', #{style}, '%') ORDER BY write_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE 1=1 AND bname = 'snap' AND gender = #{gender} AND season LIKE CONCAT('%', #{season}, '%') AND style LIKE CONCAT('%', #{style}, '%')

SELECT s.id AS snap_id, s.title, s.content, s.snapshot_image, s.additional_images, c.height, c.weight, c.profile_image, c.nickname, c.gender FROM board s JOIN customer c ON s.cus_no = c.id WHERE s.id = #{snapId}
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.prod_image FROM product p JOIN `order` o ON p.id = o.prod_no WHERE o.cus_no = #{cusNo} AND o.status = 0
SELECT id, name, prod_image FROM product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND active = 1

SELECT b.id, b.cus_no, b.gender, b.season, b.style, b.title, b.content, b.snapshot_image, b.like_count, b.write_date, b.is_del, c.profile_image FROM board b JOIN customer c ON b.cus_no = c.id WHERE b.cus_no = #{cus_no} AND bname = 'snap'
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.prod_image, p.price, p.sale, s.name AS sellerName FROM product p JOIN board_prod bp ON p.id = bp.prod_no JOIN seller s ON p.seller_no = s.id WHERE bp.board_no = #{boardNo}
